Title: Forms SC1, SC2 & SC4 (188KB)
When to Use the Forms: For cases where the deceased died domiciled in Singapore

Title: Form SC6 (37KB)
When to Use the Forms: For additional assets not declared in Form SC4 previously

Title: Forms SC1, SC3 & SC5 (51KB)
When to Use the Forms: For cases where the deceased died domiciled outside Singapore

Title: Form SC7 (37KB)
When to Use the Forms: For additional assets not declared in Form SC5 previously

Title: Form SC8 (55.5KB)
When to Use the Forms: For amendments to declarations in Forms SC4 / SC6 / SC5 / SC7
